trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"></xref> class modifies the attributes of an existing directory entry.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"></xref> class.
This constructor creates an empty request.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[])"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"></xref> class using the specified distinguished name and modifications.
The distinguished name of the object to modify.
An array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification"></xref> objects that specify the modifications.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeOperation,System.String,System.Object[])"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"></xref> class using the specified distinguished name, modification, attribute name, and values.
The distinguished name of the object to be modified.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeOperation"></xref> object that specifies the modification to perform.
The name of the attribute to modify.
The new values for the attribute.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.DistinguishedName"></xref> property contains the distinguished name of the object to modify.
The distinguished name of the object to modify.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.Modifications"></xref> property contains a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection"></xref> object that specifies a list of attribute modifications.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection"></xref> object that specifies a list of attribute modifications.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)"></xref> method creates an XML node from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> object.
